titleStmt.title: The true good old cause rightly stated, and the false un-cased.
titleStmt.author: Prynne, William, 1600-1669.

notesStmt.note: Anonymous. By William Prynne, cf. Thomason.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "I believe by Mr Prim April 30. 1659.".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
